commander.dopplegangers.comment: Each time Dopplegangers level up, the total increment of the Dopplegangers' 4 attributes is increased by an additional 5 points. At the beginning of each engagement, the Dopplegangers will copy the enemy commander's skill until the end of the engagement. The conditions required for the copied skill to trigger is also copied. The chance of the copied skill to trigger is now affected by the Dopplegangers' attributes.
commander.dopplegangers.description: Each time Dopplegangers level up, the total increment of the Dopplegangers' 4 attributes is increased by an additional 5 points. At the beginning of each engagement, the Dopplegangers will copy the enemy commander's skill until the end of the engagement. The conditions required for the copied skill to trigger is also copied. The chance of the copied skill to trigger is now affected by the Dopplegangers' attributes.
commander.erebusErrants.comment: Each time Erebus Errants levels up, the total value of their 4 attributes will increase by an additional 5 points. Erebus Errants also has a chance to negate all damage when attacked.Affected by the Dodge attribute.
commander.erebusErrants.description: Each time Erebus Errants levels up, the total value of their 4 attributes will increase by an additional 5 points. Erebus Errants also has a chance to negate all damage when attacked.Affected by the Dodge attribute.
commander.cassius.comment: When attacking, Cassius has a chance to move the enemy fleet back 3 spaces. Can only be used once per turn.Affected by the Accuracy and Dodge attributes.
commander.cassius.description: Cassius feared as much as he is respected. Unrivaled in hand-to-hand combat, his fleet maneuvers are as visceral as his brawls. Cassius' history is a tale of fortune and tragedy. Born into wealth, Cassius was privileged to study under Marcus and Hellen. However, his days as a youth were troubled and often found him on the wrong side of law. His constant infractions caused the loss of his family's wealth and his right arm. He eventually turned his life around by directing his anger into the fight against space pirates. One of his most famous exploits was a daring raid into a space pirate fortress with only 10 other space rangers. The squad took down the defenders and apprehended the pirate captain without a single casualty, making Cassius a legend throughout the galaxy.
commander.bain.comment: When Bain is attacked, there is a chance to reduce the enemy commanderâ€™s 4 attributes to 0 for the next Round.(Affected by Accuracy and Dodge attributes)
commander.bain.description: Before Bain made a name for himself as a fearsome commander for the Federation, he was busy collecting doctorates in all possible fields of science. Once Professor Bain, a mild-mannered scholar of the Federation, serving as both director of the Institute of Research on Intelligent Life (IRIL) and a mechanical engineering consultant for the Military Research Department. Director Krats of the MRD has even hailed Bain as the greatest genius of our generation. His scholarly pursuits came to an end when a freak accident changed his brilliant mind forever. While conducting an experiment on manipulating muscle memory, a glitch in the power systems caused a chain reaction, displacing parts of Bain's memory with that of his subject, Commander Aileen. Bain became a fierce fighter and leader in battle at the cost of his prior brilliance.
commander.krinaKlaus.comment: At the end of movement phase, there is a chance to increase the Overall Ship Defense of friendly fleets within 4 spaces of Krina Klaus by 10 until the end of the next Round. Affected by the dodge attribute.
commander.krinaKlaus.description: Krina Klaus hails from the Skane-XXV star system, located at the edge of the galaxy. While Skane-XXV is considered frozen, barren wasteland, impoverished compared to more prosperous sectors of civilization. But it is a place of mirth and peace. All that came to an end when rumors of a mysterious power possessed by the ruler Kringle Klaus reached the ear of the space pirates. The pirates brought fire and war to Skane-XXV, only to find their greed was for naught. Krina was sent to the core system of the Federation for her safety as her home planet laid in ruin. Receiving tutelage from Shaba, Krina Klaus now dedicates herself to protecting the innocent and weak in the galaxy from those who seek to use violence to achieve their ends.
commander.homericHellions.comment: Each time the Homeric Hellions level up, the total of its four attributes is increased by an additional 5 points. If Homeric Hellions' Dodge rating is higher than the enemy commander's Accuracy rating, Homeric Hellions' ships will not suffer any scattering damage. (Andrew + Titan)
commander.homericHellions.description: Each time the Homeric Hellions level up, the total of its four attributes is increased by an additional 5 points. If Homeric Hellions' Dodge rating is higher than the enemy commander's Accuracy rating, Homeric Hellions' ships will not suffer any scattering damage. (Andrew + Titan)
commander.winterKnights.comment: At the end of movement, there is a chance Winter Knights cannot be a target of enemy attacks and gain +15% Attack Power until end of the Round; also increases overall ship defense of allied fleets within 4 spaces by 10 until end of next Round. Affected by Accuracy and Dodge attributes.(Bart + Krina Klaus)
commander.winterKnights.description: At the end of movement, there is a chance Winter Knights cannot be a target of enemy attacks and gain +15% Attack Power until end of the Round; also increases overall ship defense of allied fleets within 4 spaces by 10 until end of next Round. Affected by Accuracy and Dodge attributes.(Bart + Krina Klaus)
commander.medusa.comment: Has a chance to cause the enemy fleet to skip its next Round when Medusa is attacked. Affected by Dodge and Electron attributes.
commander.medusa.description: Medusa first appeared in the EP-01 star system, a region of great turbulence on the fringes of the galaxy. Hell's Gates, as the system is often referred to, is avoided by both the Federation and space pirates. Itâ€™s a place where nightmares become reality. Thanks to an engineering breakthrough made by Reggie, the Federation was able to negate Medusa's deadly Gorgon Gaze ability and place her under arrest. It was then revealed that Medusa is an exiled Iliadan. Her heritage explains her magic-like ability to petrify her foes. Seeing her potential, Medusa was offered amnesty by the Federation to serve in the fight for peace in the galaxy in exchange for her freedom.
commander.venus.comment: Increases damage negation of all shield modules in the fleet. Affected by Dodge and Speed attributes.
commander.venus.description: Venus is an Iliadan, a race that claims to have originated from another galaxy. Like her fellow Iliadan, Titan, Venus possesses amazing god-like abilities. She is the embodiment of physical perfection. Her beauty is so great that few can resist swooning at the mere sight of her. Fortunately for the galaxy, Venus pledged her allegiance to the Federation after Panis first discovered her prodigious powers and charm at age 15. Venus' latent psionic potential has since been fully realized under Panis' careful guidance. Venus can control energy shield modules with but a thought, empowering them to become impenetrable to all enemy attacks.
commander.theHeartlessOnes.comment: Chance to reduce the attacking or defending enemy commander's 4 attributes to 0. (Affected by Accuracy and Dodge attributes)
commander.theHeartlessOnes.description: Chance to reduce the attacking or defending enemy commander's 4 attributes to 0. (Affected by Accuracy and Dodge attributes)
commander.theForsaken.comment: Chance to cause the attacking or defending enemy fleet to skip its next Round. (Affected by Accuracy and Dodge attributes)
commander.theForsaken.description: Chance to cause the attacking or defending enemy fleet to skip its next Round. (Affected by Accuracy and Dodge attributes)
commander.circe.comment: While defending against an attack, has a chance to prevent the enemy commander from using skills in the next Round. Affected by Accuracy and Dodge attributes.
commander.circe.description: Circe is descended from a long line of shamans. In an era where rituals and mysticism are scorned, Circe has endured the derision of her peers for her heritage. In spite of the difficult years growing up, she became an accomplished commander, graduating with honors from the Federation academy. When a routine patrol mission entered a disastrous encounter with a space pirate armada, Circe's latent powers awoke. She saved her fleet from total annihilation and was awarded the highest honor of bravery by the Federation. She's now dedicated to realizing her full potential as a shaman, offering a unique option in the Federation's arsenal.
commander.callisto.comment: Each attacking stack has a chance to increase the fleet's attack strength by 10%. Boost can be stacked and remains in effect until end of the battle. Affected by the Accuracy attribute.
commander.callisto.description: Unlike her Illiadan brethren that sought refuge with the Federation, Callisto joined the Federation in hopes they would satisfy her lust for battle. There was little hesitation on the part of the Federation in accepting Callisto's offer of peerless talent and god-like powers. Even the Illiada exalt Callisto as a -being beyond mortals-, earning her the title of a -God amongst Gods- within the Federation.
commander.thePioneers.comment: If the total combined value of The Pioneers' 4 base stats exceed those of the opposing commander, the stability of their ships will increase to their maximum strength and the fleet will not suffer any scattering damage.
commander.thePioneers.description: If the total combined value of The Pioneers' 4 base stats exceed those of the opposing commander, the stability of their ships will increase to their maximum strength and the fleet will not suffer any scattering damage.
commander.technomancers.comment: While attacking or defending, there's a chance to prevent the enemy commander from using skills for the next round. Affected by Accuracy and Dodge attributes.
commander.technomancers.description: While attacking or defending, there's a chance to prevent the enemy commander from using skills for the next round. Affected by Accuracy and Dodge attributes.
commander.queensOfBlades.comment: After moving, there's a chance Queens of Blades won't be the target of enemy attacks. Queens of Blades can be targeted if it is the only commander left. Queens of Blades also gain a 15% Attack Power boost until the end of the round and while attacking has a chance to increase the fleet's attack strength by 10%. Boost can be stacked and remains in effect until the end of battle.(Affected by Accuracy and Speed attributes)
commander.queensOfBlades.description: After moving, there's a chance Queens of Blades won't be the target of enemy attacks. Queens of Blades can be targeted if it is the only commander left. Queens of Blades also gain a 15% Attack Power boost until the end of the round and while attacking has a chance to increase the fleet's attack strength by 10%. Boost can be stacked and remains in effect until the end of battle.(Affected by Accuracy and Speed attributes)
commander.dictators.comment: Each time The Dictators level up, their four attributes will increase by an additional 5 points. Enemy commanders will also have their ability nullified if the sum of The Dictators' base stats is higher than that of the enemy commander. (Rayo + Titan) (Chance to trigger ability is affected by the 4 base stats)
commander.dictators.description: Each time The Dictators level up, their four attributes will increase by an additional 5 points. Enemy commanders will also have their ability nullified if the sum of The Dictators' base stats is higher than that of the enemy commander. (Rayo + Titan) (Chance to trigger ability is affected by the 4 base stats)
commander.duneEnforcers.comment: Each time Dune Enforcers level up, the total increment of Dune Enforcers' four attributes is increased by an additional 5 points. When attacked, the Dune Enforcers have a chance to absorb all damage and reflect it back to the attacker. (Maletiz + Titan) (Chance to trigger ability is affected by the Dodge and Speed attributes)
commander.duneEnforcers.description: Each time Dune Enforcers level up, the total increment of Dune Enforcers' four attributes is increased by an additional 5 points. When attacked, the Dune Enforcers have a chance to absorb all damage and reflect it back to the attacker. (Maletiz + Titan) (Chance to trigger ability is affected by the Dodge and Speed attributes)
commander.slayerBael.comment: During movement phase, Slayer Bael has a chance to get +500 Accuracy, and deal 500% damage while attacking, until end of the Round. (Affected by Accuracy and Dodge attributes)
commander.slayerBael.description: Bael belongs to a long-forgotten race of savage predators known as the Slayers. The extreme conditions of ETS-103 has guided the evolution of this hardy people, moulding them into natural born killers. Bael is a veritable one-entity disaster zone, capable of wrecking havoc on an planetary level. The Slayer once decimated 3 Federation armadas with a motley squadron of space pirates. A mercurial and divisive figure, Bael's unexpected defection to the Federation still has many questioning both the Slayer's and the Federation's motives behind this unorthodox alliance.
commander.lunaSilvestri.comment: Chance to gain the following ability during Movement Phase: Luna Silvestri's attacks this Round will reduce the target's max Shields and Structures by 90%, Luna Silvestri's fleet gains Adaptive Formation and increased Stability until the end of the Round. (Chance to trigger and amount of Stability increased affected by Speed and Dodge attributes)
commander.lunaSilvestri.description: Luna is a faithful servant of the Federation, having received the best tutelage from its most renowned academy. But she wasn't born into privilege. Over a decade ago, the Space Pirates invaded and annexed her home, an off-the-grid moon where the Homeric System used to be. Although she managed to escape, her family was enslaved. Luna's gifts helped her stand out among the refugees, quickly earning the favor and admiration of Federation leaders who saw her vast potential as a future Federation Fleets Commander. She now pursues a single-minded quest to free the galaxy from the oppression and ruin of the Space Pirates.
commander.chromeDome.comment: During Movement Phase, Chrome Dome has a chance to increase fleet ATK by 10x and deal 20% Scattering damage to enemy ships until the end of the Round. Affected by Accuracy and Dodge attributes.
commander.chromeDome.description: Chrome Dome has a personality as hard as his name suggests. From his notorious youth, his exploits were the stuff of legend; he staged an insurgency on a fringe planet and fought both Federation and Space Pirates alike.The anti-hero quickly established a solid power base, earning the allegiance of those who desired neither the Federation class-conscious societies nor Space Pirate senselessness. Chrome Dome was a divisive figure. His take-no-prisoners approach alienated as many allies as it did endear him to his believers.His abrasive nature eventually caught up with him when one ill-fated campaign ended in ruin after Space Pirate sleeper agents infiltrated his command ship.He was eventually rescued by Federation forces, who brought him back to life as a cyborg. Augmented by the most cutting edge bionic implants, Chrome Dome became the Federation's latest and ultimate weapon in their never ending war against the Space Pirates.
commander.shadowCountess.comment: At the end of the movement phase, has a chance to restore Shield and Structure of allied fleets within 4 spaces by 75%. Also increases Overall Ship Defense of allied Commanders within 4 spaces by 35 (does not stack). Affected by Speed and Dodge attributes.
commander.shadowCountess.description: Whatever the task or mission, the Shadow Countess is a reliable and deadly commander who always gets the job done. Despite being under the direct command of the highest echelons of the Federation, no one knows her true identity. Rumor has it that she was once a prisoner of the Space Pirates and had decided that joining the Federation was a good way to be paid for exacting revenge.
commander.murphyLawson.comment: Has a chance to increase Attack Power by 800% and reduce target enemy's ship defense to 0. Affected by the Dodge and Speed attributes. Enemy fleet's ship defense is restored at the end of the round.
commander.murphyLawson.description: Murphy Lawson lives up to his nickname, Black Hole. He crushes enemy fleets until there's nothing left but shrapnel and space. No one knows where Murphy is from or how he became such a powerful fighter, but the mystery adds to his intrigue. Unlucky ships that close in on him will have their defenses disabled before receiving a powerful blow. Anything that can happen in battle will happen.

instance.normal.1.comment: Technology and its advancements have always been a double-edged sword. Millenia of neglect and depletion of the Earth and its resources have brought about catastrophic seismic changes, releasing primal energy locked within the depths of the planet into the far reaches of the universe, creating terrible forcefields known as Black Holes at strategically mineral-rich planets.
instance.normal.2.comment: Planet R - a world so terrible that no name could adequately describe it. Magnetic fields surrounding the planet can suddenly go into disarray, causing nearby warships and spacecraft to implode like crushed cans, obliterating entire fleets in an instant.
instance.normal.3.comment: The harsh environment and scorching sands of this planet have been home to outlandish pirates for many ages. They are veteran fighters, known for their resilience and hardiness. Only by conquering these pirates can one truly claim to be the master of the galaxy.
instance.normal.4.comment: Stay alert and be ready to act at any second, for the pirates are far superior in numbers and cunning. Our resources have been severely compromised at various locations and are dwindling at an alarming rate. Our losses are piling up much faster than we can reduce their numbers. This is a dire situation indeed.
instance.normal.5.comment: This defensive system was a legend in its time, fortified by the best technology then available. The empire behind its design may have long ago perished, but the system that remains today is still a formidable barrier capable of deterring potential aggressors.
instance.normal.6.comment: The Syndicate is commonly associated with all manners of dirty dealings and wrongdoings within the galaxy to satisfy both their nefarious plans and deranged personalities. Will you be the one to bring the hammer of justice down on these villians?
instance.normal.7.comment: Beep ... beep beep ...,A coded transmission is coming in. The translated message contains a strategical report from one of the frontline scouts: The enemy is planning an attack on us. Coordinates of their deployment are ...
instance.normal.8.comment: Countless heroes have come, tried, and failed. Those few who survived walked away with unimaginable riches. Will you be one such legend, or just another statistic?
instance.normal.9.comment: The seven major powers of the galaxy are about to convene for an interplanetary negotiation. Unfortunately, a certain terrorist group is gathering its forces for the sole purpose of wiping out all the leaders involved in this peaceful exchange. If successful, their attack will sow chaos throughout the galaxy. Can you stop them?
instance.normal.10.comment: A.D. 206: A smallish spacecraft crash-landed on an abandoned planet with 48 passengers aboard. Without means to summon aid, these 48 passengers await their fate in these desolate and barren lands.
instance.normal.11.comment: An alien fleet of warships has been detected by our radar. Analysis indicates they are coming in fast, with aggressive intent. To be forewarned is to be forearmed; time to get ready for some violent confrontations!
instance.normal.12.comment: A dangerous convict recently escaped from a maximum security prison, and is now believed to have joined forces with a notorious band of pirates. Under the leadership of this convict, the pirates have managed to combine their efforts to become a mightier fighting force than any previously sighted. They are now hellbent on bringing chaos and instability to the galaxy. They must be stopped at all costs.
instance.normal.13.comment: Gloom surrounds this eerie place where ships have been abandoned for millenia. They have been shut down and put to rest forever in this forbidding place, where even light fails to penetrate. An unshakable air of death and doom fills this graveyard of behemoths.
instance.normal.14.comment: Every commander must take part in a real battle before graduating from the Galaxy College. This year, the performance in the real battle will affect the overall evaluation of a commander more when they graduate.  The enemies in the E.C.R event are bearing down menacingly, take care!
instance.normal.15.comment: There are some issues left over from history. In the past years, a group ruled the galaxy tyrannically. During the period, innumerous common people were oppressed severely. Even though the galaxy has been out of the tyrannical reign, some of the common people have been attempting to give vent to their pent-up anger by attacking the fleets passing by the galaxy.
instance.normal.16.comment: The galaxy has been divided into two independent empires by a war before. At the middle of the two empires there are still a lot of evil groups that don't submit themselves to any of the empires. To unify the galaxy again, we must first conquer the groups.
instance.normal.17.comment: Enjoy a cup of good wine before you start the journey. I believe it will be a fantastic journey even though there may be some unknown perils. Anyway, do everything to beat down the enemies.
instance.normal.18.comment: The Queen Anne has been out of sight for five years. The universe is always filled with mystery. Five years ago, when the Queen Anne passed by Missipi, the center of Missipi suddenly shrunk fast and turned into a black hole which finally swallowed the Queen Anne. By far, the black hole is still mystic and sounds horrific.
instance.normal.19.comment: Since the Yolyano planetoid began to move stably along the lunar orbit, the galaxy has entered a harmonious era. However, when Yolyano deviated from the orbit, there appeared a matrix sinuous zone with abundant resources. Anyone who manages to occupy the zone is obliged sooner or later the overlord in the galaxy.
instance.normal.20.comment: Z zone is a very mystic zone in the galaxy. In the zone, there are lots of planets which reflect sunshine in most of the time. As the result, Z zone looks so beautiful. However, most people who approached the zone have been lost mystically. What a terrible zone!
instance.normal.21.comment: In any battle, the side that acts faster will take more advantages. The Doltt pirates have always acted fast in battles. Are you able to act faster than them?
instance.normal.22.comment: Watch out for the bloodthirsty Selm pirates. You'd better not fight against them recklessly. Also, try your best to calm down when encountering them.
instance.normal.23.comment: A flock of adventurers were attacked by pirates when they approached their starting planet, planet X, and they had to land on planet X. They are suffering from exhaustion, wound, lack of oxygen and more. Please rescue them as soon as possible.
instance.normal.24.comment: There are a lot of smart pirates. They don't have the most advanced weapons. They are not very brutal either. But they have the most advanced anti-radar facilities. As a result, they've managed to plunder lots of trade caravans. Please carefully organize your warships and beat them.
instance.normal.25.comment: There is no time to consider more. Our latest attacks against the pirates have driven them crazy and they've even organized a large-scale counterattack.
instance.normal.26.comment: The pirates suffered high casualties last battle. They are now  gathering their force to counterattack. This time, we must give them a severe lesson. Launch an attack and end the annoying battle as soon as possible!
instance.normal.27.comment: Planet M is rich in resources and sell resources to gain benefits. They also signed an agreement with the pirates to avoid offense from the pirates by offering the pirates some protection fees. However, the pirates have raised the amount of yearly protection fees time and again. So the two sides have not yet reached an agreement. Then the pirates have kidnapped the lord of planet M. It is of great urgency. Please rescue the lord.
instance.normal.28.comment: Tukubu tribe has gradually got out of last century's decadence and attempted to occupy unmanned areas to get more resources for future development. However, they've been oppressed by the pirates for a long time and they are still not strong enough to beat down the pirates.
instance.normal.29.comment: All good forces in the galaxy  have signed Plan B.P for future development. However, the plan will impossibly be carried out before the largest pirate group has been eliminated.
instance.normal.30.comment: Mogrini is one of the most prestigious lords in the galaxy. However he was once captured by pirates and were almost killed. From then on, some people often studiously mentioned the dishonorable history no matter how hard Mogrini worked. However, Mogrini have not given a response but focused on making preparations for eliminating the pirates to prove himself.

prop.scroll.comment: Merges ${srcCommander.0} and ${srcCommander.1} to create Divine Commander ${commander}
prop.gem.rawGemstones.comment: Required for gem-merging. 4 Raw Gemstones will merge into 1 Gem.
prop.gem.unknownGem.comment: Get a Level 1 gem at random

corp.pirates.1.comment: This crew roams the galaxy, hijacking cargo ships and causing trouble. Problem is, the crew is small and getting smaller after every battle.
corp.pirates.2.comment: These are the eyes and ears of the pirate's. Made up of the best trackers and scouts, they can follow anyone anywhere.
corp.pirates.3.comment: Coppernose made his name when he won a battle he had no business winning, and lost his famously prominent nose in the process.
corp.pirates.4.comment: This crew is famous for their fast movement and lightning fast attacks. Using advanced engines developed from stolen Alliance blueprints, they should never be underestimated in battle.
corp.pirates.5.comment: Tough and proud, this crew utilizes the same drilling and training as the regular Alliance Army. It shows too, they regularly defeat Alliance forces in open combat.
corp.pirates.6.comment: Made up of the most brutal pirates ever assembled in one place, this crew inspires so much fear that even other pirates do their best to avoid offending them.
corp.pirates.7.comment: It's said that the leader of this mysterious crew was once a senior commander with the Alliance. However, his identity remains a mystery to this day.
corp.pirates.8.comment: This is the only pirate crew led by a woman. Tough and strong willed, its rumored she killed the old commander over a rude comment. Now she rules the crew with an iron fist, and their success in battle since that day has convinced the crew its worth it.
corp.pirates.9.comment: One of the oldest and most experienced pirate crews. They are a strong and disciplined group who know how to do battle with the best the Alliance has to offer.
corp.pirates.10.comment: Led by the legendary Pirate King, this crew is far tougher than most people could ever imagine.
